Reviews.Title: RUN AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY
Reviews.Author: jaded one
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product  (not from Amazon site) and it worked great with my laptop for the first time. With each use the range seemed to become more and more limited until finally, it would only work within six feet of the receiver/base station with no obstructions. HP CUSTOMER SERVICE IS ABSOLUTELY THE WORST!! This from someone who owns/uses a HP desktop /HP printer/ HP laptop. NO MORE !!

Reviews.Title: Joke
Reviews.Author: Glenn Norton
Reviews.Content: worked great for 3 days. Customer service was pathetic. will return and will no longer n HP accessory.The "Indian English" was to die for.
